attributes.action: Review Child Maintenance Service (CMS) rules on reduced income claims & arrears
attributes.additional_details:
Current CMS processes allow paying parents to repeatedly reduce payments, renegotiate arrears, and submit special expenses claims with limited scrutiny. 
Errors, delays, and inconsistent calculations are leaving children without the financial support they are entitled to for long periods. 
Arrears can be prolonged for years, undermining confidence in the system and causing financial strain for receiving parents. 
A review is urgently needed to ensure fairness, accuracy, and accountability.
attributes.background: Review CMS rules and processes for accepting reduced income claims, managing arrears, and allowing special expenses deductions. The review should ensure decisions are properly evidenced, consistently applied, and prioritise children receiving the correct level of financial support.
